price: Bali Yeye ndiye mtakaye mwomba, naye atakuondoleeni mnacho mwombea akipenda. Na mtasahau hao mnao wafanya washirika wake.
arabic: بَلۡ إِيَّاهُ تَدۡعُونَ فَيَكۡشِفُ مَا تَدۡعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ إِن شَآءَ وَتَنسَوۡنَ مَا تُشۡرِكُونَ
footnotes: Bali nyinyi mnamuelekea Yeye mnapo muomba akakuondoleeni mnacho taka kiondolewe, pindi akipenda. Na mnapo kuwa katika hali hii ya shida mnawasahau hao mnao wafanya ni washirika wake Mwenyezi Mungu!!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: bal iyyāhu tadʿūna fayakshifu mā tadʿūna ilayhi in shāa watansawna mā tush'rikūna
